languages.text: "Я уж было подумал, что вы пришли за исповедью, но теперь вижу, что сами взяли на себя роль духовного лица. Да пребудет с вами Император в этом поиске ответов".
"For a moment I thought you had come to confess, but now I see you have taken on the role of cleric yourself. May the Emperor guide you on your quest for answers."
languages.original_text: "Я уж было подумал, что вы пришли за исповедью, но теперь вижу, что сами взяли на себя роль духовного лица. Да пребудет с вами Император в этом поиске ответов".

traits.locale_text: "For a moment I thought you came to confess, but now I see you have taken on the role of a cleric yourself. May the Emperor be with you on your quest for answers."
"For a moment I thought you came to confess, but now I see you have taken on the role of a cleric yourself. May the Emperor be with you on your quest for answers."
"For a moment I thought you had come to confess, but now I see you have taken on the role of cleric yourself. May the Emperor guide you on your quest for answers."
"For a moment I thought you had come to confess, but now I see you have taken on the role of cleric yourself. May the Emperor guide you on your quest for answers."
"For a moment I thought you had come to confess, but now I see you have taken on the role of cleric yourself. May the Emperor guide you on your quest for answers."
"For a moment I thought you had come to confess, but now I see you have taken on the role of cleric yourself. May the Emperor guide you on your quest for answers."

languages.text: « J'ai cru l'espace d'un instant que vous étiez {mf|venu|venue} vous confesser, mais je vois maintenant que vous avez vous-même endossé le rôle de clerc. Puisse l'Empereur vous guide dans votre quête de réponses. »
languages.original_text: "For a moment I thought you had come to confess, but now I see you have taken on the role of cleric yourself. May the Emperor guide you on your quest for answers."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai cru l'espace d'un instant que vous étiez {mf|venu|venue} vous confesser, mais je vois maintenant que vous avez vous-même endossé le rôle de clerc. Puisse l'Empereur vous guide dans votre quête de réponses. »

languages.text: «Por un momento he creído que venía a confesarse, pero ahora veo que es usted quien ha adoptado el papel de clérigo. Que el Emperador le guíe en su búsqueda de respuestas».
languages.original_text: "For a moment I thought you had come to confess, but now I see you have taken on the role of cleric yourself. May the Emperor guide you on your quest for answers."

traits.locale_text: «Por un momento he creído que venía a confesarse, pero ahora veo que es usted quien ha adoptado el papel de clérigo. Que el Emperador le guíe en su búsqueda de respuestas».

languages.text: “我刚刚以为您是来忏悔的，但现在我明白了，原来您也扮演了告解神父的角色。愿帝皇保佑您，也愿您能找到您寻求的答案。”
languages.original_text: "For a moment I thought you had come to confess, but now I see you have taken on the role of cleric yourself. May the Emperor guide you on your quest for answers."

traits.locale_text: “我刚刚以为您是来忏悔的，但现在我明白了，原来您也扮演了告解神父的角色。愿帝皇保佑您，也愿您能找到您寻求的答案。”

languages.text: 「一瞬だけ、告白をしに来たのかと思いました。しかし、あなたはクレリックの役割を引き受けたのですね。皇帝があなたの答えの探求をお助けしてくれますように」
languages.original_text: "For a moment I thought you had come to confess, but now I see you have taken on the role of cleric yourself. May the Emperor guide you on your quest for answers."

traits.locale_text: 「一瞬だけ、告白をしに来たのかと思いました。しかし、あなたはクレリックの役割を引き受けたのですね。皇帝があなたの答えの探求をお助けしてくれますように」

languages.text: "Einen Augenblick lang dachte ich, Ihr seid gekommen, um die Beichte abzulegen, doch nun sehe ich, dass Ihr selbst die Rolle {mf|eines Klerikers|einer Klerikerin} angenommen habt. Möge der Imperator Euch auf Eurer Suche nach Antworten lenken."
languages.original_text: "For a moment I thought you had come to confess, but now I see you have taken on the role of cleric yourself. May the Emperor guide you on your quest for answers."

traits.locale_text: "Einen Augenblick lang dachte ich, Ihr seid gekommen, um die Beichte abzulegen, doch nun sehe ich, dass Ihr selbst die Rolle {mf|eines Klerikers|einer Klerikerin} angenommen habt. Möge der Imperator Euch auf Eurer Suche nach Antworten lenken."

languages.text: "Bir anlığına günah çıkarmak için geldiğinizi düşünmüştüm ama şimdi görüyorum ki ruhban rolüne bizzat bürünmüşsünüz. İmparator yanıt arayışınızda size kılavuzluk etsin."
languages.original_text: "For a moment I thought you had come to confess, but now I see you have taken on the role of cleric yourself. May the Emperor guide you on your quest for answers."
